EmailTemplate.description: I Won An iPad from VinSolutions!
EmailTemplate.name: I Won an iPad from VinSolutions
EmailTemplate.subject: I Won an iPad from VinSolutions!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Marcia Manning is VinSolutions' first “Be One With Vin” Winner:
Congratulations to Marcia Manning of Woody Butts Chevrolet. On Wednesday, January 26 Marcia won a new iPad from VinSolutions in the 2011 VinSolutions NADA Promotion, "Be One with Vin." To be eligible, Marcia either had to post "Be One with Vin" on the VinSolutions Facebook fan page (facebook.com/VinSolutions) or just be a member of the VinSolutions online Community (http://community.vinsolutions.com).
VinSolutions is giving away up to $150,000 in the "Be One with Vin" promotion. For more information, check out www.VintoWin.com
